mapper.select: /*kr.kosmo.jobkorea.manageC.dao.lectureHDHDao.listLectureGrp*/ select lt.title as title ,ui.name as name ,DATE_FORMAT(lt.startdate, "%Y-%m-%d") as startdate ,DATE_FORMAT(lt.enddate, "%Y-%m-%d") as enddate ,lt.room as room ,lt.attend as attend ,lt.lateness as lateness ,lt.absent as absent , ( select tp.processrate from tb_process tp where tp.no = lt.no and tp.seq = ( select ifnull(max(seq),0) from tb_process tp2 where tp2.no = lt.no ) ) as proceed ,lt.no as no from tb_userinfo ui ,tb_lecture lt ,tb_tcourse tc where ui.loginID = lt.loginID and tc.loginID = #{loginID} and lt.no = tc.no LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}

/*kr.kosmo.jobkorea.manageC.dao.lectureHDHDao.selectLectureGrp*/ select lt.title as title ,ui.name as name ,DATE_FORMAT(lt.startdate, "%Y-%m-%d") as startdate ,DATE_FORMAT(lt.enddate, "%Y-%m-%d") as enddate ,lt.room as room ,lt.attend as attend ,lt.lateness as lateness ,lt.absent as absent , ( select tp.processrate from tb_process tp where tp.no = lt.no and tp.seq = ( select ifnull(max(seq),0) from tb_process tp2 where tp2.no = lt.no ) ) as proceed ,lt.no as no ,lt.plan as plan from tb_userinfo ui ,tb_lecture lt ,tb_tcourse tc where ui.loginID = lt.loginID and tc.loginID = #{loginID} and lt.no = tc.no and lt.no = #{no}
